attributes.action: STOP ISLAMOPHOBIA IN THE UNITED KINGDOM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop Islamophobia within the United Kingdom 

In recent months, we have viewed an increase in Islamophobia and rising levels of violence and verbal abuse directed at Britain’s richly diverse Muslim community. 

We, the undersigned, agree the Muslim community make an enormous contribution to this country, being fully represented in the Armed Forces, Police, Business, Art and various other fields. Furthermore, many occupy very prominent positions.  

 
We call on the Prime Minister to make it explicitly clear:

we support the right of Muslims, like any other people, to dress, follow their culture and worship as they please, within the limits of the present law.

· We oppose all forms of discrimination, including Islamphobia and will work with the Muslim community to tackle Islamophobia at every level of British society.
